title: liying
text:
About Me.
Hi, I am Li Ying, a Penultimate undergraduate at the National University of Singapore. Professionally, I am an ambivert individual with an inquisite mind to adapt fast to a new environment. In all (non)seriousness, I enjoy writing, is a novice (but passionate) meal-maker, occasional gamer, and also loves doodling.
Poke around my website to learn more, and feel free to contact me if you have any questions or would like to discuss potential collaborations!

title: About
text:
I am currently a penultimate undergraduate at the National University of Singapore, pursuing a Bachelor’s in Business Administration with a major in Marketing alongside a minor in Interactive Media Development. As I was introduced to the world of data analysis/coding a tad later than my peers, I was really apprehensive towards this field. But thankfully I was surrounded by some really supportive professors/instructors and peers who gave me immense help to make up for being a ‘laggard’.
With that being said, I am also a good team player who’s not afraid to experiment with fresh things. I really believe in the importance of being an eager self-directed learner, hence and I enjoy gaining new knowledge along the way.

title: liying
text:
Hi, I am Li Ying, a Penultimate undergraduate at the National University of Singapore. Currently pursuing a Bachelor’s in Business Administration, I am taking up a major in Marketing alongside a minor in Interactive Media Development.

I am an ambivert individuals with an inquisite mind to adapt fast to a new environment. A good team player, I am not afraid to experiment with fresh things. I am also an eager self-directed learner and I enjoy gaining new knowledge along the way.

title: About
text:
hobbies.
I feel very fortunate to have the ability to indulge in many of the things that i love a lot now. Albeit university life can be taxing (with all the never-ending assignments, quizzes, and project…), I allow myself to unwind and relax through things that I take interest in.
I enjoy gaming, journalling, and doodling. The logo I am currently using is designed myself when I first started experimenting with Procreate. In addition, I also think that it is important to avoid leading a sedentary lifestyle, hence dancing is also one of my hobby. Just a fun fact about myself, I’ve been doing ballet since I was three, and I still enjoy this genre of dance very much.










My logo.
